text:
Hello EveryOne
I am using this api for fatch all attachments Id, but I' getting few attachments ID.
If I remove attachment in deal and than add new attachment file, it's working fine, but before this scenario I'm not getting all documents
<https://api.hubapi.com/engagements/v1/engagements/associated/deal/"+%20DealID%20+"/paged?attachments=true>

Hi everyone,

Is there any way to fetch the engagements that are associated to particular user?
Hi, Can we update/edit the total revenue field in the HubSpot via UI / API? If anyone can answer to this?
Is there a reason the user provisioning Retrieve a User produces a 404 error when it doesn't find a match instead of sending back a empty array?

Hi all, I hope this is the right channel to ask about HubSpot integration with other App.

I would like to know if there is a possibility to retrieve using API user's custom properties created for Company or Deal?

If you're asking to retrieve the custom properties of an object then, yes. You can retrieve it by adding the name of the custom property to the properties param in your request.

<http://hubapi.com/object/123123123?properties=hs_name,my_custom_property|hubapi.com/object/123123123?properties=hs_name,my_custom_property>
Thank you Christensen. What about retrieving all custom properties of an Ojbect created by the user based on the Object name e.g Deal (belonging to a specific user)
Looks like they are paged, do you have a screenshot of the api response

You can achieve that by fetching the schema of an object which will also have a createdUserId property to identify the user who created the custom property.

/crm/v3/schemas/contacts
Thank you

Hi everyone!
I'm looking for a way to export all my whatsapp texts that are in HubSpot to a Sheet
The HubSpot support team sent me the url to the Conversations API (<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/conversations/conversations>)

However, when I click on the "Run in Postman", I get this:

Could anyone help me with that?

I think I understood how to make the requests to the API, but I don't have the skills to create on my own using Postman
I'd really appreciate any help!
Thanks in advance
Hi everyone, does anyone have experience with captcha design? As soon as I turn captcha on, the design created within webflow gets lost and transits back to its original HubSpot form. Any got a clue?

Hello I'm receiving a "405 Method Not Allowed" when PATCHing a contact. I just do something like:

```PATCH <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts/#{id}>

{
  "properties": {
      email: contact.email,
      firstname: contact.first_name,
      lastname: contact.last_name,
      phone: contact.phone,
      address: contact.address_1,
      street_address_2: contact.address_2,
      city: contact.city,
      state: contact.state,
      zip: contact.postal_code,
      ok_to_contact: contact.ok_to_contact
   }
}```
You can contact me at <mailto:dorian@oblsk.com|dorian@oblsk.com>

Hy, <@URQV7LU79> here is the response API and this is the api
<https://api.hubapi.com/engagements/v1/engagements/associated/deal/11663445974>

<@U05ELH23S4A>
We have successfully retrieved all available results, as indicated by the `hasMore` parameter being set to `false`. Our next course of action is to investigate the possibility of deleted activities related to that record. Specifically, we will focus on engagements such as NOTES, which are commonly used for adding attachments. To guide us in this process, please refer to the following article on restoring deleted activities in a record: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/records/restore-deleted-activity-in-a-record|Restoring Deleted Activity in a Record>.

<@URQV7LU79>
I try to pass this parameter but I can't show all the attachments id
Which parameter?
`hasMore`

You do not have to pass it, its returned on your response API and it will be at the bottom of your response. If its value is set to `false` that means there is no more data apart from what you have received

<@URQV7LU79>
ok now, How can I get all the attachment ID, give me solution
Have you done what I mentioned here <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YHAHB6K/p1711520324665939?thread_ts=1711437311.992359&cid=C2YHAHB6K>
